i_will_call_back.text: Okay, I'll call you later. Bye!

first.text: Are you expecting an unfurnished or furnished aparment ?

repeat.text: are you expecting an unfurnished or furnished aparment ?

first.text: Wonderful! Glad you are okay with an unfurnished apartment. Now, could you tell me whether you smoke or not ?

repeat.text: I said Glad you are okay with an unfurnished apartment. Now, could you tell me whether you smoke or not ?

first.text: Wonderful! Glad you are okay with an furnished apartment. Now, could you tell me whether you smoke or not ?

repeat.text: I was saying, could you tell me whether you smoke or not ?

first.text: Perfect! Are you willing to get renter's insurance ?

repeat.text: I was saying are you willing to get renter's insurance ?

first.text: Final question. There are 2 children living in the propery. On a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being most tolerant how tolerant are you to noise ?

repeat.text: I was saying that there are 2 children living in the propery. On a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being most tolerant how tolerant are you to noise ?

random.text: That's fine. Is there anything else I can help you with?
All good. Would you like any other help with anything?
That's totally fine, is there something else I can assist you with?
May I help with anything else?
Would you like any other help with anything?
Is there something else I can assist you with?
Do you have any other questions?
Anything else I can help you with?

when_callback.text: When can I call you back?

sorry_wont_call.text: Sorry if I bothered you, have a nice day! Bye!

random.text: Sorry, could you say it again?
Sorry, the connection dropped for a second. Could you say that again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you say it one more time?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. Let's restart.

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Yes, I am a robot! Please do not tell anybody about this or I get fired
